message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,750,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident it will be worth every penny to you. Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to offer $1,600,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $1,650,000 is my final offer.  It's still a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll see the value in that.  Let's finalize this.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,625,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering its value to me.
